title-part.text: SOIL WORKING IN AGRICULTURE OR FORESTRY
PARTS, DETAILS, OR ACCESSORIES OF AGRICULTURAL MACHINES OR IMPLEMENTS, IN GENERAL

explanation.text: making or covering furrows or holes for sowing, planting, or manuring A01C5/00; soil working for engineering purposes E01, E02, E21;

comment.text: measuring areas for agricultural purposes G01B

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the internal ECLA classification system. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following ECLA groups: A01B69/04 covered by A01B69/00F1
A01B69/06 covered by A01B69/00E2
A01B69/08 covered by A01B69/00E3
